info.name: KissanMitra API
info.description: Complete API collection for KissanMitra application testing

item.name: Authentication

request.description: Sends OTP to the specified phone number for authentication.
Verifies OTP and returns JWT token. Token is automatically saved to environment variable.
Selects active role for the session. Returns new JWT token with updated role. Role must be one of: FARMER, VLE, ADMIN.
Gets current authenticated user details.

item.description: Authentication endpoints for OTP-based login and role management.

item.name: Discovery

exec: // Save first device ID if available

request.description: Searches for devices based on location and filters. No authentication required. Returns only LIVE devices with active pricing rules.
Creates a discovery intent for pre-login interest. No authentication required.

item.description: Public discovery endpoints for browsing equipment before login.

item.name: Public

request.description: Gets active device types for dropdown. No authentication required. Returns code + displayName pairs.

response.name: Success Response

request.description: Gets active manufacturers for dropdown. No authentication required. Returns code + name pairs.

response.name: Success Response

item.description: Public endpoints for master data dropdowns. No authentication required.

item.name: Orders

request.description: Creates a new order. Order type (RENT/LEASE) is automatically derived from thresholds.
Gets all orders for the current authenticated user.
Gets order details by ID.
Updates order status. Only valid state transitions are allowed.

item.description: Order management endpoints for creating and managing orders.

request.description: Updates user profile information. All fields are optional (partial updates). Phone number cannot be updated. Requires authentication.
Gets user details by ID. Requires authentication.
Gets lease by ID. Requires authentication.
Gets current user's leases (for VLE role). Requires authentication.

item.name: VLE Profiles

request.description: Gets VLE profile by ID. Requires authentication.
Gets current user's VLE profile. Requires authentication and VLE role.

item.description: VLE profile endpoints for non-admin users.

request.description: Registers push notification token for current user. Requires authentication.

item.name: Admin

exec: // Save device ID for subsequent steps

body.raw:
{
    "sensorId": "SENSOR-001",
    "name": "Heavy Duty Tractor",
    "description": "Mahindra 575 tractor in excellent condition",
    "deviceTypeId": "{{device_type_code}}",
    "manufacturerId": "{{manufacturer_code}}",
    "owner": "John Doe",
    "manufacturedDate": "01/2020",
    "address": {
        "firstLine": "123 Main Street",
        "secondLine": "Near City Park",
        "pinCode": "560001",
        "city": "Bangalore",
        "state": "Karnataka",
        "country": "India"
    },
    "location": {
        "type": "Point",
        "coordinates": [77.5946, 12.9716]
    },
    "companyOwned": true,
    "requiresOperator": true
}

request.description: Step 1 of device onboarding: Creates device with basic details. Device starts with DRAFT status. Requires ADMIN role. Use device_type_code and manufacturer_code (not IDs).

response.name: Success Response
response.body:
{
    "success": true,
    "message": "Operation successful",
    "data": {
        "id": "507f1f77bcf86cd799439031",
        "sensorId": "SENSOR-001",
        "name": "Heavy Duty Tractor",
        "description": "Mahindra 575 tractor in excellent condition",
        "deviceTypeId": "TRACTOR",
        "manufacturerId": "MAHINDRA",
        "owner": "John Doe",
        "manufacturedDate": "01/2020",
        "address": {
            "firstLine": "123 Main Street",
            "pinCode": "560001",
            "city": "Bangalore",
            "state": "Karnataka",
            "country": "India"
        },
        "pincode": "560001",
        "location": {
            "type": "Point",
            "coordinates": [77.5946, 12.9716]
        },
        "companyOwned": true,
        "requiresOperator": true,
        "status": "DRAFT",
        "createdAt": "2025-01-01T00:00:00Z",
        "updatedAt": "2025-01-01T00:00:00Z"
    },
    "correlationId": "req-123456",
    "timestamp": "2025-01-01T00:00:00Z"
}

formdata.description: Image or video files (JPG, PNG, MP4, MOV). Max 20MB per file.
Optional: Index of file to mark as primary (0-based)

request.description: Step 2 of device onboarding: Upload media files (images/videos) to S3. Can be called multiple times. Requires ADMIN role.

item.name: Device Onboarding - Step 3: Get Pricing Status

request.description: Step 3 of device onboarding: Check if pricing rules exist for device. Returns default rule and time-specific rules. Requires ADMIN role.

item.name: Device Onboarding - Step 3: Create Pricing Rule

request.description: Step 3 of device onboarding: Create pricing rules for device. Default rule is mandatory. Time-specific rules are optional. Requires ADMIN role.
Step 4 of device onboarding: Get complete summary of all entered information. Coordinates are NOT exposed. Requires ADMIN role.

response.name: Success Response

request.description: Step 4 of device onboarding: Finalize device. ONBOARD = hidden (ONBOARDED status), TAKE_LIVE = visible (LIVE status, requires pricing rule). Requires ADMIN role.

response.name: Error - No Pricing Rule

request.description: Legacy endpoint: Creates a device directly. Prefer using 4-step onboarding flow. Requires ADMIN role. Use device_type_code and manufacturer_code (not IDs).

query.description: Optional: Filter by status (DRAFT, ONBOARDED, LIVE, NOT_LIVE, UNDER_MAINTENANCE, RETIRED)
Optional: Search by name or device type

request.description: Gets all devices with optional filters (status, search, pagination). Requires ADMIN role.
Gets device by ID. Requires ADMIN role.

response.name: Success Response
response.body:
{
    "success": true,
    "message": "Operation successful",
    "data": {
        "id": "507f1f77bcf86cd799439031",
        "sensorId": "SENSOR-001",
        "name": "Heavy Duty Tractor",
        "description": "Mahindra 575 tractor",
        "deviceTypeId": "TRACTOR",
        "manufacturerId": "MAHINDRA",
        "owner": "John Doe",
        "status": "LIVE",
        "location": {
            "type": "Point",
            "coordinates": [77.5946, 12.9716]
        },
        "pincode": "560001",
        "mediaUrls": ["https://s3.../image1.jpg"],
        "primaryMediaUrl": "https://s3.../image1.jpg"
    },
    "correlationId": "req-123456",
    "timestamp": "2025-01-01T00:00:00Z"
}

request.description: Updates device (supports partial updates). Use device_type_code and manufacturer_code. Requires ADMIN role.

query.description: New status (DRAFT, ONBOARDED, LIVE, NOT_LIVE, UNDER_MAINTENANCE, RETIRED)

request.description: Updates device status. LIVE status requires active pricing rule. RETIRED status cannot be changed. Requires ADMIN role.
Creates a VLE profile. Requires ADMIN role.
Gets all VLE profiles. Requires ADMIN role.
Gets VLE profile by ID. Requires ADMIN role.
Creates a lease from an approved LEASE order. Requires ADMIN role.
Gets lease by ID. Requires ADMIN role.
Gets all leases, optionally filtered by VLE ID. Requires ADMIN role.
Assigns an operator to a lease. Requires ADMIN role.
Creates a new operator. Requires ADMIN role.
Gets all active operators. Requires ADMIN role.
Gets operator by ID. Requires ADMIN role.
Updates operator. Requires ADMIN role.

item.name: Device Types

exec: pm.test("Response has device type data", function () {

request.description: Creates a new device type. Code must be unique and uppercase. Requires ADMIN role.

response.name: Success Response
response.body:
{
    "success": true,
    "message": "Operation successful",
    "data": {
        "id": "507f1f77bcf86cd799439011",
        "code": "TRACTOR",
        "displayName": "Heavy Duty Tractor",
        "requiresOperator": true,
        "active": true,
        "createdAt": "2025-01-01T00:00:00Z",
        "updatedAt": "2025-01-01T00:00:00Z"
    },
    "correlationId": "req-123456",
    "timestamp": "2025-01-01T00:00:00Z"
}

request.description: Gets all device types. Optional query parameter 'active' to filter by status. Requires ADMIN role.

response.name: Success Response
response.body:
{
    "success": true,
    "message": "Operation successful",
    "data": [
        {
            "id": "507f1f77bcf86cd799439011",
            "code": "TRACTOR",
            "displayName": "Heavy Duty Tractor",
            "requiresOperator": true,
            "active": true,
            "createdAt": "2025-01-01T00:00:00Z",
            "updatedAt": "2025-01-01T00:00:00Z"
        },
        {
            "id": "507f1f77bcf86cd799439012",
            "code": "HARVESTER",
            "displayName": "Combine Harvester",
            "requiresOperator": true,
            "active": true,
            "createdAt": "2025-01-01T00:00:00Z",
            "updatedAt": "2025-01-01T00:00:00Z"
        }
    ],
    "correlationId": "req-123456",
    "timestamp": "2025-01-01T00:00:00Z"
}

request.description: Gets device type by code. Code is case-insensitive (automatically converted to uppercase). Requires ADMIN role.

response.name: Success Response
response.body:
{
    "success": true,
    "message": "Operation successful",
    "data": {
        "id": "507f1f77bcf86cd799439011",
        "code": "TRACTOR",
        "displayName": "Heavy Duty Tractor",
        "requiresOperator": true,
        "active": true,
        "createdAt": "2025-01-01T00:00:00Z",
        "updatedAt": "2025-01-01T00:00:00Z"
    },
    "correlationId": "req-123456",
    "timestamp": "2025-01-01T00:00:00Z"
}

request.description: Updates device type. Code is immutable (cannot be changed). Only displayName, requiresOperator, and active can be updated. Requires ADMIN role.

response.name: Success Response
response.body:
{
    "success": true,
    "message": "Operation successful",
    "data": {
        "id": "507f1f77bcf86cd799439011",
        "code": "TRACTOR",
        "displayName": "Updated Tractor Name",
        "requiresOperator": false,
        "active": true,
        "createdAt": "2025-01-01T00:00:00Z",
        "updatedAt": "2025-01-01T01:00:00Z"
    },
    "correlationId": "req-123456",
    "timestamp": "2025-01-01T01:00:00Z"
}

request.description: Soft deletes device type (sets active=false). Cannot delete if devices, pricing rules, or threshold configs reference it. Requires ADMIN role.

response.name: Success Response
response.body:
{
    "success": true,
    "message": "Operation successful",
    "data": "Device type soft deleted successfully",
    "correlationId": "req-123456",
    "timestamp": "2025-01-01T01:00:00Z"
}

response.name: Error - Has References

item.description: Device type master data management endpoints. Code is immutable identifier.

item.name: Manufacturers

request.description: Creates a new manufacturer. Code must be unique and uppercase. Requires ADMIN role.
Gets all manufacturers. Optional query parameter 'active' to filter by status. Requires ADMIN role.

response.name: Success Response
response.body:
{
    "success": true,
    "message": "Operation successful",
    "data": [
        {
            "id": "507f1f77bcf86cd799439021",
            "code": "MAHINDRA",
            "name": "Mahindra Tractors",
            "active": true,
            "createdAt": "2025-01-01T00:00:00Z",
            "updatedAt": "2025-01-01T00:00:00Z"
        },
        {
            "id": "507f1f77bcf86cd799439022",
            "code": "JOHN_DEERE",
            "name": "John Deere India",
            "active": true,
            "createdAt": "2025-01-01T00:00:00Z",
            "updatedAt": "2025-01-01T00:00:00Z"
        }
    ],
    "correlationId": "req-123456",
    "timestamp": "2025-01-01T00:00:00Z"
}

request.description: Gets manufacturer by code. Code is case-insensitive (automatically converted to uppercase). Requires ADMIN role.
Updates manufacturer. Code is immutable (cannot be changed). Only name and active can be updated. Requires ADMIN role.
Soft deletes manufacturer (sets active=false). Cannot delete if devices reference it. Requires ADMIN role.

response.name: Error - Has References

item.description: Manufacturer master data management endpoints. Code is immutable identifier.

request.description: Creates a pricing rule. Requires ADMIN role. Use device_type_code (not ID).
Updates pricing rule. Requires ADMIN role.
Creates or updates pricing threshold. Requires ADMIN role. Use device_type_code (not ID).
Gets threshold config for device type. Requires ADMIN role. Use device_type_code (not ID).

item.description: Admin endpoints for managing devices, VLEs, pricing, and other master data.
